• Sensors: Temp (3), Precip gauge (4), Solar rad; Infrared rad, RH, SM/ST, “wetness”, etc. • 26-ft dia SDFIR, or 9-ft dia double alter. • CS 1000 datalogger, 34-month data storage. • GOES DCS communications with ice/snow antenna cover; 7-level layered comms. • 5-minute data reported hourly. • AC and Solar Power versions. • Modular, expandable, upgradable. • Weight: ~976 lbs. • Cost: ~$57K, calibrated & ready for deployment • Sensors: Temp (3), Precip gauge (4), Solar rad; Infrared rad, RH, SM/ST, “wetness”, etc.

page.title:
What is NIDIS?
What is NIDIS?
page.normal_text:
National Integrated Drought Information System NIDIS: An integrated, interagency national drought monitoring and forecasting system that provides:
National Integrated Drought Information System
NIDIS: An integrated, interagency national drought N I D I S : A n
i n t e g r a t e d ,
i n t e r a g e n c y
n a t i o n a l
d r o u g h t
monitoring and forecasting system that provides:

An early warning & forecast system for drought. Drought impact and causation education. Information for drought mitigation. An interactive, web-based drought portal. Improved observational capabilities.

The 109th Congress introduced H.R. 5136/S. 2751 to improve national drought preparedness, mitigation and response efforts.

drought preparedness, mitigation and response efforts.
